title: File:Ohakuri.Rotorua.Paired.Eruptions.Rift.Zone.North.Island.NZ.jpg
author: ChaseKiwi
description: Approximate location and outlines (white) of the paired single event Rotorua and Ohakuri calderas with approximate known surrounding Mamaku (blue) and Ohakuri ignimbrites (yellow phase 1 and dark yellow phase 2). The relationship to the  inactive southern portion (red dots) and currently active northern portion (red line) of the Horohoro Fault is shown. Relationships also shown to old Taupo Rift (light yellow shading), modern Taupo Rift (light red shading) and Hauraki Rift (light purple shading). The present landmarks of Lake Taupo and Mount Tarawera are labelled for orientation.
